text: Heliophanus uvirensis is a jumping spider species in the genus Heliophanus. It was first described by Wanda Wesołowska in 1986 and lives in Democratic Republic of the Congo. ==References== Category:Spiders described in 1986 Category:Fauna of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Salticidae Category:Spiders of Africa Category:Taxa named by Wanda Wesołowska
title: Heliophanus uvirensis
